text: @KMCGcharmed @CRobertsonUK It's not the full story. Vaccines are only found when  it looks like there will be a financial rewarded at the end of the process. It the disease recedes all attempts at a vaccine get stopped. it doesn' mean a vaccine could not be found; they just stop looking.
